name: Fox Village
description:
Currently in development - post feedback in comments :) 

Feed your own little village of foxes! Make sure you feed the foxes enough so they don't run away! Inspired by the Fox Village in Shiroishi, Japan!

Buy and feed foxes!

Get more points by having happy foxes!

Grow plants, get food! Notes about Playing
  • The game autosaves for you every 1 minute (you can see a "Saving" text in the bottom. You can manually save in Manager > Settings.
  • Save Data is automatically created on Start. Clear your saves in the title screen.
  • You can't feed a fox when they're taking a nap.
  • Got ideas for new foxes? Let me know in the comments and I might make them for the game! :D
Future Development Goals
  • LOTS of collectable foxes (at least 50 in the final version)
  • Name your foxes and your village!
  • Better visuals, UI, and overall polish
  • Published on Google Play
